name: Valid Accounts
description: Adversaries may obtain and abuse credentials of existing accounts to gain access to resources.

name: Command and Scripting Interpreter
description: Adversaries may abuse command-line interpreters and scripting languages to execute arbitrary commands.

name: Remote Services
description: Adversaries may use remote services such as RDP, SMB, or SSH to move laterally within an environment.

name: Data Encrypted for Impact
description: Adversaries may encrypt data on targeted systems to disrupt availability or to support extortion.

name: Inhibit System Recovery
description: Adversaries may delete or modify backups and recovery mechanisms to make recovery more difficult.
